channel.title: How do i add bandos to experienced shop help plz!
channel.description: how do i add it i want it to sell 10 of them and for 400m each ids are 15349 for tassets and 15348 for chest plate

item.title: How do i add bandos to experienced shop help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyofadown Mikeyofadown
item.description:
@Mikeyofadown wrote:

Open up ‘shops.cfg’ or ‘shop.cfg’

CTRL + F for the shop’s name (what it says in the top center).
Then at the end of the area for the experienced shop
tab15349tab10tab15348tab10

Then open up ‘item.cfg’
CTRL + F (if your item has bonus’ on it…)

15349

You’ll see alot of numbers there lined up. (this is the whip on my server…)

item = 4151	Abyssal_whip	A_weapon_from_the_abyss.	651608.0013642381	651608.0013642381	850929.5918252946	0	82	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	0	82	0

This is starting from the left:

First: Item ID
2nd: Name
3rd: Examine
4th: Low Alch Value (or high, I forgot)
5th: Shop price (WHAT YOU INCREASE TO 400M!)
6th: Alch Value

The rest are for stat bonuses.

GL on your server

~Mikeyofadown

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add bandos to experienced shop help plz!
